title: This smart scale could help you lose weight—and it's on sale
text:
This smart scale could help you lose weight—and it's on sale

This smart scale from Eufy can help track your weight loss and improve your overall health. (Photo: Eufy)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Anker's innovative smart home brand, Eufy, is known for all sorts of their useful, well-made gadgets. From their affordable robot vacuums to their video baby monitors, each device can help make your life simpler in all sorts of ways. For instance, their smart scale can help you track your health and weight loss journey by measuring your BMI, muscle mass, and more over time, and right now, it's at its lowest price ever on Amazon.

When you step on the Eufy BodySense Smart Scale, it uses electric sensors to measure your weight, body fat percentage, body mass index (BMI), and other stats. It then sends all the data to the EufyLife app, which can sync with both Apple Health and Google Fit so you can easily view your data and observe your progress over time. Plus, the app can store data for up to 20 accounts so that everyone in your family can use the scale. While most smart scales exceed $100, the Eufy scale just dropped from $44.99 to an all-time low price of $28.99 for a limited time.

As affordable as it is well-performing, you can't go wrong with Eufy's BodySense scale whether you're beginning a weight loss journey or simply just trying to track your health more closely, especially when it's at this crazy low price.
